nodes.text: Media Lab Publishing, or Media Lab Books, is a consumer magazine publishing company that produces single-topic magazines and books for some of the largest brands in the world. The company has a semi-independent editorial department called Topix Media Lab.

Topix Media Lab has published Star Wars works such as Star Wars: 100 Defining Moments, Star Wars: Your Great Big Galaxy: Hop Aboard the Millennium Falcon and Explore Outer Space with Your Favorite Heroes!, Star Wars: The Force Awakens - The Official Collector's Edition and Star Wars: The Force Awakens—The Official Visual Story Guide.
